info.name: Attendance-X API Complete Test Suite
info.description: Comprehensive Postman collection for testing all Attendance-X API endpoints - 145+ endpoints across 16 modules

exec: if (now >= expiry - 60000) { // Refresh 1 minute before expiry
body: { mode: 'raw', raw: JSON.stringify({ refreshToken: pm.globals.get('refreshToken') }) }

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Fix audio system issues",
  "description": "The audio system in the main conference room is not working properly. Participants cannot hear clearly during meetings.",
  "assignedTo": ["{{userId}}"],
  "dueDate": "2024-12-15T17:00:00Z",
  "priority": "high",
  "tags": ["audio", "conference-room", "urgent"],
  "estimatedHours": 4
}

{
  "title": "Fix audio system issues - Updated",
  "description": "Updated description: The audio system in the main conference room has been diagnosed. Need to replace the main amplifier.",
  "status": "in_progress",
  "priority": "medium",
  "progress": 25,
  "actualHours": 1.5
}
